channel.title: Projects on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Home

item.title: 1. Image Classification | Computer Vision
item.description: Built a Machine Learning model that can classify different sportpersons using their images. Did this classification for the following 5 athletets: Lionel Messi, Maria Sharapova, Roger Federer, Serena Williams, Virat Kohli. Engineered features via OpenCV, transforming the images using wavelet transform and used these feautures to train a classifier. Optimized SVM, Logistic Regression, and Random Forest Classifiers using GridsearchCV to reach the best model. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: 2. Loan Default Predictions | Artificial Neural Network
item.description: Given historical data on loans with information on whether or not the borrower defaulted (charge-off), one can build a model that can predict weather or not a borrower will pay back their loan. This way in the future when the bank gets a new potential customer, it can assess whether or not they are likely to pay back the loan. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: 3. Movies Recommendation System
item.description: We can develop a basic recommendation system using Python and pandas. We could focus on providing this recommendation system by suggesting items that are most similar to a particular item, in this case, movies. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: 4. Covid Dataset Dashboard
item.description: Data exploration, transformation, extraction using MySQL Server. Created a Dashboard on Tableau Public from the extracted Data containing useful plots. Link to SQL Code Link to Tableau Dashboard
